revised_title: Stieltjes Transforms and the Stokes Phenomenon: Asymptotic Expansions and Error Bounds
tldr: This article discusses the Stieltjes transforms and the Stokes phenomenon, focusing on the asymptotic expansions and error bounds for the modified Bessel function. The authors explore the behavior of the function near the negative real axis and provide different bounds for the remainder term after optimal truncation. They also demonstrate how to compute the function accurately using an Euler transformation and discuss the transition between different approximations as the phase of the complex variable changes.
